title: Hinggi (men's Ceremonial Wrapper), early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: tied resist patterning in warp (ikat) on plain weave
description: Rectangular men's ceremonial wrapper (hinggi) with patola-inspired pattern of a geometric grid composed of overlapped circles. Skull tree or 'andung' band at both ends with other bands of animals (roosters or other birds). Fringed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hinggi (men's Ceremonial Wrapper), early 20th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: tied resist patterning in warp (ikat) on plain weave. 1978-170-1.
